name: Ninja Runner (Kubi :3)
description:
Enjoy, i finished it at 6:00 AM O.o
if find any bugs, feel free to comment it below :D
Controls  =

Atk Normal : Ctrl
Atk Up : Ctrl+UP (you can also attack ( dont release the button ) and press UP )
Jump : Up key
Shuriken : In air = Ctrl+up
Bomb : in air = Ctrl
